abstract: The former Disney chief’s newest company, Tornante, is teaming up with Sinclair Broadcast Group to produce and distribute new syndicated shows to be aired mostly during the day by local stations.
snippet: The former Disney chief’s newest company, Tornante, is teaming up with Sinclair Broadcast Group to produce and distribute new syndicated shows to be aired mostly during the day by local stations.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Michael D. Eisner is best known for developing the Walt Disney Company into a diversified entertainment conglomerate, but one specific slice of the media business has always been his sweet spot: television.

headline.main: Eisner Brings His Media Expertise to Local TV Markets
headline.print_headline: Eisner Takes Media Savvy to Local TV

abstract: The restructuring that joins Disney Consumer Products and Disney Interactive reflects growing overlap between the two businesses.
snippet: The restructuring that joins Disney Consumer Products and Disney Interactive reflects growing overlap between the two businesses.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Children do not separate their toys into two piles — traditional and digital — and now the Walt Disney Company won’t either.

headline.main: Disney Merges Consumer Product and Interactive Units
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Disney Will Merge Divisions Dealing With Digital Products
